title: Cloned Threads
description: A clone of Meta's Threads. User can make a post, or make a comment to the post, follow users, check out and edit own's profile. Created with next.js, react, node.js, express, postgreSQL

title: MessageMe Messanger
description: A simple messaging app with http. User can view who's online, send them message, or create a group chat, then check out other's or edit own's profile. Created with react, react-router, node.js, express, postgreSQL

title: Game - Where's Waldo
description: Like Where's Waldo, user is given a large image which contains several elements to find. Lastly, user add name to leaderboard. Created with react, vite, bootstrap, node.js, express, mongoDB
